Class ClientGameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • rmi.client.RmiClientController
      • rmi.client.ClientGameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.rmi.Remote, IClientController

    public final class ClientGameController
extends RmiClientController
    a concrete implementation of a battleships client
    Author:
    rverbist
